Text:
Is Silent Hill 2: Restless Dreams, or
SILENT HILL 2 - INNER FEARS??????

SILENT HILL 2 - INNER FEARS
or
Silent Hill 2: Restless Dreams
This is Inner Fears but it won't work :(
dirty disc error!!! what can i do to make it work?

It's not inner fears it's restless dreams, and it worked fine for me, well almost fine. in the part in the forest just before you get to silent hill, the trees are missing textures so they just appear as wierd black shapes, and a few other things are also missing textures also. once I was in the town of silent hill itself i didnt notice anything wrong though.

I don't know why it didn't work for you guys, if ur using unleashx, instead of using the A button to launch the game, press start and a menu should appear, then try the run game in pal/ntsc mode. Or you could try changing yous systems region setting.
after you download how do you burn it
thanks for the upload but could someone seed this please

could someone seed this plz i'm stuck at 90%
thanks
goddamnit. i am looking for inner fears :S :S
i ll try this one thanks a lot been looking for

well worked like a charm expect for some tiny  glitches im in the blue greek level by the time im writing this and in some room in that building y ll get chased by a bunch of flying papers which is supposed to be  butterflys ..nothing serious tho.. and its inner fears on the game menu not restless dreams like it sais on the dashboard or when y burn it on a dvd ..
1.unrar 
2.ftp it using qwix..well thats what i did ..peace
Just Burn with imgburn works Fine...  but AFAIK it is Inner Fears because it is in German, English, etc. ... so it is the Euro Version.
In this ISO find default.xbe file fnd open it in HEX editor and see this string NKS.i.l.e.n.t. .H.i.l.l. .2.:. .R.e.s.t.l.e.s.s. .D.r.e.a.m.s.
